name: Sheet Breach
description:
In Sheet Breach you use your boat to mercilessly plow through frozen ice sheets in search of the treasure hidden underneath.

The game supports keyboard and most common controller types:
Movement - Arrow Keys / WASD / Thumbstick
Boost - Space Bar / A
Retry - R / Y
Quit - Escape / B

The game was created over a weekend and uses mostly assets created by me, but I also want to give special thanks to:

  • TeTeNoise for Seagull ambience track.
  • https://www.zapsplat.com for additional sound effects.

The font used is DIRECT MESSAGE by VEXED.
KenShape was used to create the player model.
